__e: Well, you see, Alfred, I would love to help you, but it would infringe upon my personal interests.
Alfred, he looked at me in the shower and he wouldn't leave.
If you want me to make you rich, Alfred, you'll take me as you find me and do what I ask of you.
You don't give a damn about Alfred, and you sure as hell don't care about me.
Yeah, and Alfred is safer - everything he knows - we're all safer if he's with you.
You don't give a damn about Alfred, and you sure as hell don't care about me.
No, not as bad as that, but, anyway, Jack and Alfred are not really brothers.
When you called Alfred... It wasn't your voice, it was god's voice!
If Alfred didn't kill your son, who do you think did?
Alfred's right. It's time for bed.
Alfred said he'd be at a gun range for a few days, but I checked every one in the city.
Alfred acted upon your advice. You share in his glory.
